department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of a Stoplog Lifter for the Department of Public Works and Government Services.
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of a Stoplog Lifter.
full_summary:
========================================================

**Re-Tender for Stoplog Lifter**
=====================================

**Reference:** WS3937526060-Doc4530568119
**Amendment Number:** 7
**Publication Date:** 2024-06-05
**Closing Date:** 2024-07-30T14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the purchase of a Stoplog Lifter.
The procurement method is competitive with open bidding, and the selection criteria are based on the lowest price.
The trade agreements that apply to this solicitation include the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others (see below).

**Eligibility:**
The following trade agreements are applicable:
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Delivery Location:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

**Contact Information:**
Martial, Daniel
daniel.martial@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Procurement Documents:**
Further information and procurement documents can be accessed via the following URL:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19924742

Note that this tender has been cancelled.

========================================================

Words used (273). Under the limit.
